description_for_human: Unified forum feed for crypto, AI, and open source communities.
description_for_model: Access discussions from 100+ Discourse forums across crypto governance (Arbitrum, Uniswap, Aave, ENS), AI/ML (OpenAI, Hugging Face, PyTorch), and open source (Rust, Swift, NixOS). Use this to monitor forum activity, search discussions, find governance proposals, track community sentiment, or discover trending topics.
